img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b2/Wukong_Snowhill_8.jpg)
Luckily, they don't have much health and are easily dodged -- but note that the Frozen Corpses with spiked maces will swing wildly a few times after they've been "killed" so street clear of their death throes.
img_below_text:
You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it.
![Wukong Snowhill 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e7/Wukong_Snowhill_10.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Snowhill 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b2/Wukong_Snowhill_8.jpg)
Luckily, they don't have much health and are easily dodged -- but note that the Frozen Corpses with spiked maces will swing wildly a few times after they've been "killed" so street clear of their death throes."
        - Following Text: "You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it.
![Wukong Snowhill 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e7/Wukong_Snowhill_10.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the player-controlled character, Wukong, navigating a snowy terrain toward a large column with a glowing green Wisp visible in the background. The area is part of the Snowhill region in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The preceding and following text suggests that this location contains Frozen Corpses as enemies, including two guarding the Wisp, which can be absorbed for progression or rewards. The gameplay interface shows health, abilities, and resources, emphasizing exploration and combat readiness.
